plot: After living for thirty years in a small park in Mexico City, a balloon seller known as the Barely, decides to return to his home. Will his family accept him back? Can he change his life on the streets for the comfort of his house?
title: De puro aire
plot_es: After living for thirty years in a small park in Mexico City, a balloon seller known as the Barely, decides to return to his home. Will his family accept him back? Can he change his life on the streets for the comfort of his house?
plot_en: After living for thirty years in a small park in Mexico City, a balloon seller known as the Barely, decides to return to his home. Will his family accept him back? Can he change his life on the streets for the comfort of his house?
